<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit stack arity, i.e. the number of stacked arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RegisteredArgs = IntPtrSize == 4 ? 5 : 6;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackArity = MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#ad698a1f47410fdd4aeaa489f3d865019">getFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#ac6baa801e4aea800984e760d5460662f">arg&#95;size</a>() &gt; RegisteredArgs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              ? MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#ad698a1f47410fdd4aeaa489f3d865019">getFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#ac6baa801e4aea800984e760d5460662f">arg&#95;size</a>() - RegisteredArgs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a64eafd6bed9f342e423e74a93223135c">AddComment</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;stack arity&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ad87d51ae3e480de2e3892fc257406212">emitInt16</a>(StackArity);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit the number of live roots in the function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">    OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a64eafd6bed9f342e423e74a93223135c">AddComment</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;live root count&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ad87d51ae3e480de2e3892fc257406212">emitInt16</a>(MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#a61aea3cbd5619f46ce9aa2ce3799ff9d">live&#95;size</a>(PI));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And for each live root...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#aa9282de572d03dca73f282b617f64bd0">GCFunctionInfo::live&#95;iterator</a> LI = MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#a81c7cd06eff3dc773acdbcdf7f654879">live&#95;begin</a>(PI),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                       LE = MD.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/gcfunctioninfo/#a9da823485016de1037a37cc2f66739c9">live&#95;end</a>(PI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">         LI != LE; ++LI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Emit live root&#39;s offset within the stack frame.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">      OS.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcstreamer/#a64eafd6bed9f342e423e74a93223135c">AddComment</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;stack index (offset / wordsize)&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      AP.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/asmprinter/#ad87d51ae3e480de2e3892fc257406212">emitInt16</a>(LI-&gt;StackOffset / IntPtrSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
